pages.text: $(li)The Enderite Ingot is an even harder material than the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/witherite_ingot)Witherite Ingot$(/l).$(br)$(li)It seems that it can be dropped by the $(#9007c8)$(l)Ender Dragon$() on death.$(br)$(li)This material can be used to forge the $(l:patchouli:weapons/zweiender)Zweiender$(/l) in the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smithing_table)Smithing Table$(/l).
